create.prompt:
Use case: YouTube Shorts music visualizer
Primary request: Final uplifting closer with unity, Om vibe, and modern youth energy.
Scene/background: cosmic horizon with abstract mandala wave and floating city lights
Subject: rising orb, concentric rings, flowing light ribbons
Action: 0-4s rings pulse with rhythm; 4-8s orb rises and radiates; 8-12s wide reveal with calm triumphant glow
Camera: vertical crane-up move ending in wide reveal, smooth cinematic motion
Lighting/mood: golden dawn glow mixed with neon backlight, inspirational atmosphere
Color palette: gold, deep blue, violet accents, soft white
Style/format: contemporary trap aesthetic fused with spiritual futurism; abstract animation style
Audio: visual-only clip for external rap soundtrack; no generated dialogue
Constraints: under-18 suitable, no logos, no text overlays, no real humans, no specific copyrighted characters
Avoid: flicker, motion jitter, text artifacts, logos, watermarks
